google_google_folder_iam_member.description: Allows management of a single member for a single binding on the IAM policy for a Google Cloud Platform folder.

folder.description: The resource name of the folder the policy is attached to. Its format is folders/{folder_id}.

member.description: The identity that will be granted the privilege in the `role`. For more details on format and restrictions see https://cloud.google.com/billing/reference/rest/v1/Policy#Binding

role.description: The role that should be applied. Note that custom roles must be of the format

etag.description: (Computed) The etag of the folder's IAM policy.
